game.name: SokoGhost: Unfinished Business
game.shortDescription: SokoGhost: Unfinished Business is a block-pushing game where you can pass through walls and boxes! A new level of Sokoban inspired puzzles.
game.shortDescriptionEn: SokoGhost: Unfinished Business is a block-pushing game where you can pass through walls and boxes! A new level of Sokoban inspired puzzles.
